pages.text: Benzo-Solvent is an organic solvent produced from the controlled burning of logs and coals in the Coal Tar Processor. There is a config option to require or not the use of RF Power for the machine.

Benzo-Solvent is used to dissolve cleaned fossils, raw meats or plant materals to extract DNA from them. It is also used in the manufacture of Oligopools. Hoppers (and modded equivalents) can be used to insert and extract from the machine.
